  • Method Details

    • getQuestion

      public String getQuestion()
      Access question text
      Returns:
      Question text

    • setQuestion

      public void setQuestion(String question) throws Exception
      Set the question text. Length of which should be in range (0, QuestionDatabase.QUESTION_LENGTH_LIMIT)
      Parameters:
      question - Question text for setting
      Throws:
      Exception - Question text length out of range

    • getAnswer

      public String getAnswer()
      Access answer text
      Returns:
      Answer text

    • setAnswer

      public void setAnswer(String answer) throws Exception
      Set the answer text. Length of which should be in range (0, QuestionDatabase.ANSWER_LENGTH_LIMIT). Different question type has different validation rules for the answer. Visit specific QuestionTypeFactory.validateAnswer() for details.
      Parameters:
      answer - Answer text for setting
      Throws:
      Exception - Answer text length out of range, or validation failed for the question type

    • getType

      public QuestionType getType()
      Access the question type
      Returns:
      Question type

    • getTypeFactory

      public QuestionTypeFactory getTypeFactory()
      Access the question type factory corresponding to the question type
      Returns:
      QuestionTypeFactory subclasses for specific Question type

    • setType

      public void setType(QuestionType type)
      Set the question type
      Parameters:
      type - Question type for setting

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Access the question score
      Returns:
      Question score

    • setScore

      public void setScore(int score) throws Exception
      Set the question score. Question score should be in range (QuestionDatabase.SCORE_LOWER_LIMIT, QuestionDatabase.SCORE_UPPER_LIMIT)
      Parameters:
      score - Question score
      Throws:
      Exception - Question score out of range

    • setScore

      public void setScore(String score) throws Exception
      Set the question score. Question score should be in range (QuestionDatabase.SCORE_LOWER_LIMIT, QuestionDatabase.SCORE_UPPER_LIMIT)
      Parameters:
      score - Question score in string
      Throws:
      Exception - Question score is not an integer, or out of range

      public void setOptionA(String optionA) throws Exception
      Set option A. Validation rule for options vary on the question type. Visit specific QuestionTypeFactory.validateOption() for details
      Parameters:
      optionA - Option A for setting
      Throws:
      Exception - Validation failed
